website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced, natural formula that is best suited for individuals who need light coverage and don't have sensitive skin.
pros: Has a smooth feel and goes on easily
Limited ingredients means lower incidence of breakouts and irritations
Comes in a wide range of shade options
cons: Some darker shades have an orange-like tint
Has the tendency to fade from the skin throughout the day
Some users complain about breakouts after use

customer_reviews.title: Better personally for my skin than bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This makeup is so much better for me personally than bare escentuals. I didn't break out in hives or acne like I do with bare minerals. I like the size of the jar. I've finally found my holy Grail in mineral makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie M.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I first tried this makeup. The coverage was AWESOME (covered all of my red areas on my face with ease) and looked very natural. But as the day goes on, it seems to separate on my skin and look cakey. I tried using different primers & even different amounts of the mineral powder when applying, but nothing changed the way it set after a few hours. I’m sad, because this is the first mineral powder that actually covered well!! I’ve tried bare minerals matte and honestly hated it. It didn’t cover ANYTHING for me, no matter how much I used (& even when I used concealer underneath).
customer_reviews.author: madematteis

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointingly low quality
customer_reviews.text: Waste! Makeup is not mineral like. It's not fine or powder like. It's like granulated or gritty. Hard to explain but don't waste your money. Prices are too high for low quantity and quality. Coverage was minimul and you need to always have the entire product line to use any of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's a great alternative to bare minerals, and much cheaper. It matches my skin tone perfectly and covers the red blotchiness in my cheeks and nose. It has a very light feel. I've bought it 3 times. The only thing I miss about bare minerals is that the container that it comes in has a slidable piece on the inside so that you can close off the bottom compartment when you close it, and when you open it up it doesn't spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Caity cat

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is really good coverage, the fair shade runs a bit dark for me but I am still very pleased with the amount of coverage and smoothness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Looks good when you first apply but darkens after long wear. You'll start out looking great but turn into a pumpkin.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helps set your make-up. This jar lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and love it. I get the same results as a much higher priced product from the department stores.
customer_reviews.author: common sense

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why there are so many good reviews. How are you supposed to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm using the wrong moisturizer underneath, but this powder foundation goes on clumpy... I don't understand why there are so many good reviews. How are you supposed to put it on?! Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Hooked
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bare minerals for a long time, but I'm sick of paying $$$ for it. Tried this and liked it better! The coverage is good, definitely use primer with it though to get a better look. I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this, but the usual name brand was difficult in terms of color, even though I don't use much, and the cost savings are significant. I had even looked into making my own. This is perfect and much more convenient. Better color, same coverage, no bad reactions from my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Varnes

customer_reviews.title: Made my face itch
customer_reviews.text: I've used many kinda of mineral foundation, and this is the first one that's made me itch. No rash. I do t usually have sensitive skin. Coverage was light, did not stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anne Haha

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Not to be overly dramatic but I have sensitive skin and this is the FIRST makeup I've been able to wear for decades. I know, I've read that before, but I've wasted so much money on products that caused me to have skin bumps and pitting. I finally gave up and was making my own out of cornstarch and zinc oxide when I saw this. Took a chance ONE more time and miraculously, no bumps! No facial pitting! I am ecstatic. This seems super finely milled and light, very flattering and not chalky or cakey (as my homemade stuff certainly was.) if you have sensitive skin, I hope it's your "holy grail" too!
customer_reviews.author: azuremountain

customer_reviews.title: It works great, & makes my powdered foundation go further
customer_reviews.text: I mix this product with my own "homemade" powder foundation to increase its "cover"factor. It works great, & makes my powdered foundation go further! Also, good price! Mrs NJ Carter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well & Clean Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup. No complaints. I appreciate a company that can market a clean product without chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: BlurryfaceTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as the more expensive products! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and as good as the pricey brand!
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to re-order this brand of products. Great selection on blushes and eyeshadows, and this foundation matches my skin perfectly but does not irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Nana5

customer_reviews.title: Half a day...
customer_reviews.text: This make up does not stay on with medical gear. It comes off very easily. I get about a half a day. For those in medical field wearing face masks, this is not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: iachoku

customer_reviews.title: Great price and safe pick
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is a great replacement for the more expensive Bare Minerals. Plus it has more basic ingredients -- it's a safe pick! It does take a little more powder for coverage, but I'm okay with that. I've been using it a while now and it's non-irritating to my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: tigerlily77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up line in general and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is the greatest! coverage is fantastic! matches my skin perfectly! makes my skin feel so soft. great product.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE VAN ATTA

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Really nice powder, good quality. I think I use a little more for coverage than I did with Bare Minerals, but for the price it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Padovano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item multiple times - sooo pleased Ordered this item multiple times - sooo pleased Thank you Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Feels Nice - Looks Great - Wallet Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mineral foundation to replace the pricier one I've been using for a long time. I actually like it better. It's got a very lightweight feel to it and my sensitive skin likes it. It just feels cleaner and like there aren't as many crappy ingredients in it. I am very fair skinned so went with the Natural shade. My recommendation is if you are fair, you will appreciate this shade for winter months. I will definitely go to the next darker shade for spring and summer. I'm hooked. I will likely not feel the desire to go back. My wallet thanks you IQ!! Please keep it reasonable!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good powder careful opening
customer_reviews.text: The tape covering the holes on the powder dispenser took the entire plastic covering with it resulting in a big mess. I was able to save some of the powder and put the cover back on but was very disappointed. I bought this powder after running out from the starter kit I purchased a while back. I like the powder. It feels good going on and has ok staying power. Good for the price except for the packaging snafu.
customer_reviews.author: H. CrockerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I used Bare Minerals for years and bore the cost with clenched teeth. This is the closest I have ever found and at a very reasonable price! Very decent amount in the package too. I found that using a little of the Bisque concealer mixed in provides just the right creamy coverage, use a tiny bit of the Mineral Veil to finish and I get a nice not too "made up" look all day. I would recommend this to anyone either familiar with mineral makeup or new to it. It is a great alternative to the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawless finish
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. I had used liquid foundation for years, but it would look “cakey” & it would separate. I never could find one that would stay smooth all day. This mineral foundation does exactly what I wanted. It’s applied after applying a primer & stays looking great all day long.
customer_reviews.author: ash917

customer_reviews.title: Grainy, terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using mineral powder foundation forever. This is the first terrible one. The powder isn’t finely ground - you can see and feel chunks. Because it’s not finely ground the coverage is terrible. Rather than looking like you have healthy clear skin by smoothing things out and covering imperfections, you look like you’re wearing clown makeup. It stays visible on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good Bare Minerals knock-off for the "Fair" shade
customer_reviews.text: Good Bare Minerals knock-off for the "Fair" shade. I have pink undertones and this made me look kind of yellow. I put it on in the morning (7am) and I start looking a little shiney by about noon so I wouldn't say it lasts all day, at least not for me, but I do have oily-ish skin. It's a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for Sheer Cover product
customer_reviews.text: The color is as pictured and the product works well on my face. IT lasts as long as Sheer Cover did and Sheer Cover was getting more difficult to find, especially in the lighter shades. Very glad that I tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: reader dear

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this stuff due to it was cheaper at the time them my normal Bare Minerals. This stuff dried my skin out, made my T zone flare. Not happy. Going back to what is actually a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product, a little darker then expected.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this powder, with a small brush it works well as a concealer and then a larger brush for a light dusting on the rest of the face. However it is a little darker then I expected, next time I'll order the lighter Fair instead. Overal all though it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Micah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I wanted a new concealer that was healthy for the environment, healthy for me, and not tested on animals. It did come a little darker than expected, but there is a lighter version I will try next time. It's hard to know what you're getting when you are trying a new product.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin, and so far this is doing great. I seem to be able to get good coverage, (I have a little extra redness on my cheeks and forehead) and yet keep it natural looking as well. I want to check out some of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. This was my third purchase. Great coverage and layer-able if need more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: Bare minerals quality - half the price :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this product as much as bare minerals. Matches skin tone very well, blends easily, no skin irritation, and need to use very little for great coverage! Long lasting coverage. Was a little skeptical but am very pleased and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it is lighter than I thought it would be but keeping it
customer_reviews.author: Wipala

customer_reviews.title: Too dark, and only ok coverage
customer_reviews.text: This make up just wasn't a good match for my skin color or skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Your Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a powdered foundation that doesn't irritate my skin (I have very sensitive skin) and stays on all day. I like the price too. It's just right.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! Easily blends and much cheaper than the competition. Fast shipping and easier color match. Go for it girl!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this mineral foundation. It is very good. I would highly recommend it to anyone wanting a good quality foundation!
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder! I was looking for a new foundation. I'm in my forties, and my usual drugstore brand liquid foundation was starting to settle in my laugh lines. I have never used a mineral powder foundation but have used colorscience powder sunscreen and like it a lot. I was considering the colorscience powder foundation, but I saw this and it had great reviews and it is less expensive. I must say that I am impressed. It looks so natural but still covers! I highly recommend this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great, and won't make you orange
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a healthier alternative to Bare Minerals, but did not want a crappy product that turned me orange. I can honestly say that I cannot tell the difference between the two products on my face. It is beautiful and I have a very natural complexion with it. And for more product at half the price, I will keep coming back for more! Thanks for your great product, IQ
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: covers even bad blemishes very well with several applications
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago, and I am very impressed with it. It matches my skin well, covers even bad blemishes very well with several applications. Like any powdered makeup, it works best on my face when I gently scrub my face and then apply moisturizer (I've been using jojoba oil), then apply the makeup a few minutes later. It seems to stay on pretty well, certainly better than the physicians formula paraben free powder I was using before. I love it and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie M

product_meta.title: iQ Natural Mineral Foundation Loose Powder 10g Sifter Jar, Long Lasting All-Day Wear, Flawless Finish Makeup, Full Coverage – Matte | Sensitive Skin Approved | Color DARK
feature_bullets: ✅ FULL SIZE PRODUCT: Premium mineral foundation packaged in large 10 gram size sifter jar that is sealed for your safety.
✅ HIDES FLAWS: IQ Natural Mineral foundation hides your flaws, not your face!
✅ FOUNDATION BLENDS: Beautifully and provides adjustable full coverage from light to full unlike liquid foundations.
✅ NOT CHEMICALS: No Talc, Perfume, Dyes, Phthalates, Bismuth, Parabens.
✅ COLOR MATCH GUARANTEE: If your not satisfied with the color you select, let us know. We offer a color Match guarantee and will exchange it for a better match no questions asked!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
